CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Deceased_Date__c)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Date_of_Birth__c)), TEXT(FLOOR((DATEVALUE(animalos__Deceased_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c) / 365.25)) & ' Years ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((DATEVALUE(animalos__Deceased_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c), 365.25) / 30.44)) & ' Months ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(MOD((DATEVALUE(animalos__Deceased_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c), 365.25), 30.44))) & ' Days', NULL ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Date_of_Birth__c)), TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c) / 365.25)) & ' Years ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c), 365.25) / 30.44)) & ' Months ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(MOD((TODAY() - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c), 365.25), 30.44))) & ' Days', NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Calculated Age
